sentences.sContent: My newlywed wife and I are deeply in love.
sentences.sContent_eng: My newlywed wife and I are deeply in love.
sentences.sCn: 我和我的新婚妻子彼此深爱着对方。

sentences.sContent: Lavalais raised his glass to propose a toast to the newlyweds.
sentences.sCn: 拉瓦莱斯举起了他的酒杯，向这对新婚夫妇敬酒。

remMethod.val: newly(新近地) + wed(结婚) → 新婚的人

trans.tranOther: Newlyweds are a man and woman who have very recently got married to each other
